contentHtml: #Q. 31. What is the event.target when clicking the button? <div onclick="console.log('first div')"> <div onclick="console.log('second div')"> <button onclick="console.log('button')">Click!</button> </div> </div> html A: Outer div B: Inner div C: button D: An array of all nested elements. ðŸ’¡ Answer Answer: C The deepest nested element that caused the event is the target of the event. You can stop bubbling
